title: AVIRA 8 ANTIVIRUS & INTERNET SECURITY(WITH KEYS).rar
description:
Now there?s even more for you ? version 8 of Avira AntiVir is here and includes: 

up to 20% faster AntiVir engine for even faster detection 
new graphical user interface with improved user guidance 
anti-drive-by against automatic downloading of malware when surfing the net 
anti-bot stops integration of the PC in bot networks, where hackers take control of thousands of computers 
back-up system to back up your data 
RescueSystem for PCs that become unbootable 
rescue system for the safe restart of your PC after a virus attack 
... and lots more.
